recipe.title: Strawberry Margarita Ice Pops
ingredients: 8 (1/3-cup) ice pop molds and 8 wooden sticks
instructions: Blend all ingredients in a blender until smooth, then force through a fine sieve into a large glass measuring cup. Pour into molds and add sticks. Freeze at least 24 hours.
